data.text:
In David Fincher

…the relatively small-scale crime drama Se7en (1995), which revolves around two detectives (played by Morgan Freeman and Brad Pitt) searching for a serial killer (played by Kevin Spacey) who bases his murders on the seven deadly sins. The moody Se7en earned positive reviews and was a box-office success, establishing Fincher…

In Gwyneth Paltrow

…Brad Pitt in the thriller Se7en (1995). Her first starring role, as the title character in the 1996 film adaptation of Jane Austen’s Emma, garnered high praise. In 1998 she appeared in five films, most notably Shakespeare in Love, in which she gave an Academy Award-winning performance as William Shakespeare

In Brad Pitt: Early life and work

…detective in the gritty thriller Se7en (1995) and as a demented malcontent in the fantasy 12 Monkeys (1995), for which he won a Golden Globe Award and was nominated for an Oscar.

…Swimming with Sharks (1994), and Se7en (1995). His performance in The Usual Suspects (1995) as a double-talking con man earned him an Academy Award for best supporting actor.
